Sentencas: Synthesis of La3Ni2NbO9 and La3Ni2TaO9 double perovskite materials was successfully carried out.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical property study of La3Ni2MO9 (M=Nb and TA)

Sentencas: Both isostructural niobates and tantalates exhibited a monoclinic structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical property study of La3Ni2MO9 (M=Nb and TA)

Sentencas: Sample preparation via solid state reaction yielded a single phase of La3Ni2NbO9, while samples with impurities were obtained when using the sol-gel process.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical property study of La3Ni2MO9 (M=Nb and TA)

Sentencas: Nb and Ta substitution in La3Ni2MO9 had effects on the sintering behavior.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical property study of La3Ni2MO9 (M=Nb and TA)

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of La3Ni2NbO9 was found to significantly increase with increasing temperature, but the electrical conductivity of La3Ni2TaO9 decreased with temperature when the temperature was lower than 300 degrees C then slightly increased again at higher temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical property study of La3Ni2MO9 (M=Nb and TA)
